sn32:2.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:2.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti?
sn32:2.1.4: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
sn32:2.1.8: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:2.1.9: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
sn32:2.1.10: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:3-12.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:3-12.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti?
sn32:3-12.1.4: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
sn32:3-12.1.8: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:3-12.1.11: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
sn32:3-12.1.12: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:13-52.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:13-52.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā uṇhavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ …pe…
sn32:13-52.1.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
sn32:13-52.1.11: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32:13-52.1.14: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
sn32:13-52.1.15: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
sn32:53.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:53.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā sītaṃ hotī”ti?
sn32:53.1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya sītaṃ hoti.
sn32:53.1.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā sītaṃ hotī”ti.
sn32:54.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:54.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṃ hotī”ti?
sn32:54.1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya uṇhaṃ hoti.
sn32:54.1.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā uṇhaṃ hotī”ti.
sn32:55.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:55.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṃ hotī”ti?
sn32:55.1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya abbhaṃ hoti.
sn32:55.1.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā abbhaṃ hotī”ti.
sn32:56.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:56.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā vāto hotī”ti?
sn32:56.1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya vāto hoti.
sn32:56.1.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā vāto hotī”ti.
sn32:57.1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn32:57.1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti?
sn32:57.1.6: ‘yannūna mayaṃ sakāya ratiyā vaseyyāmā’ti, tesaṃ taṃ cetopaṇidhimanvāya devo vassati.
sn32:57.1.7: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yenekadā devo vassatī”ti.
